name: AMERICAN BANKERS INSURANCE COMPANY OF FLORIDA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE
name_abbreviation: American Bankers Insurance v. Commonwealth, Department of Insurance

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: AMERICAN BANKERS INSURANCE COMPANY OF FLORIDA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William R. Balaban, Patricia A. Carey, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Albert J. Strohecker, III, Hannah Leavitt, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
458 A.2d 939
AMERICAN BANKERS INSURANCE COMPANY OF FLORIDA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 18, 1983.
Decided April 27, 1983.
William R. Balaban, Patricia A. Carey, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Albert J. Strohecker, III, Hannah Leavitt, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
